page.title: 15A COMMUTER'S FAMILY
page.content: The Brown family have lived in the village for 15 years.Mr Brown works on Tyneside and travels there daily.The children,Gareth and Natalie were born in the village.The family could live anywhere in the area but chose Hamsterley. Mr Brown says,"As my occupation in business is in Tyneside, together with long hours spent in towns and cities,the peace and quiet of country living is very appealing. Recognising the lack of cultural amenities,our children are encouraged to take part in other activities such as music,theatre,tennis and archery which warrants transporting by me.Our canal and waterway interests are shared and pursued as a family group. The facilities available in towns are within easy travelling distance and we feel that is better to live in this environment and travel to them."
